43135.summary: Some customers in the North Richmond area of Richmond experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43135.title: Oct 18 - Richmond (North Richmond) | All Service - Outage (Fix in Progress)
